items.title: My brother refuses to sell our family’s $150K lake house, yet I pay all the bills. Do I push it and risk ruining our relationship?
items.description: ”I have no intention of going back to the lake house, yet he expects me to pay for upkeep and taxes.”

items.title: Burry says he’s ‘happy’ even as shares of insurer he’s championed, Molina, dive nearly 30%

items.title: Jeep maker Stellantis facing worst-ever stock rout as it takes $26 billion hit over miscalculating EV demand
items.description: Shares of Stellantis are headed for their worst-ever day of trading after the carmaker announced a massive charge to reset its business.
